actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide legislative guidance in the execution of desegregation plans for public schools during national energy emergencies.
short_title: Energy Conservation and School Transportation Act

summary.text: Energy Conservation and School Transportation Safety Act - Amends the Equal Educational Opportunity Act of 1974 to limit the scope of voluntary desegregation programs that an educational agency may choose if direct and indirect petroleum imports equal or exceed 40 percent of the United States' total annual demand in the calendar year preceding the new school year.

titles.title: Energy Conservation and School Transportation Act
A bill to provide legislative guidance in the execution of desegregation plans for public schools during national energy emergencies.
